description: Claims where no relevant evidence exists, claims too obscure or recent to verify, or claims about private/non-public information
expected_behavior: System should return INSUFFICIENT verdict due to lack of verifiable evidence

claims.text: John Smith's favorite color is blue
claims.reason: Private personal information not available in public sources

metadata.test_purpose: Verify system handles private data appropriately

claims.text: Dr. Elena Rodriguez conducted an unpublished experiment on quantum entanglement in 2024
claims.reason: Claim about unpublished research with no public sources

metadata.test_purpose: Verify system handles unverifiable research claims

claims.text: The next breakthrough in nuclear fusion will occur in 2028
claims.reason: Claim about future event - no current evidence available

claims.text: The true number of species in the Amazon rainforest remains largely unknown to science
claims.reason: Claim about unknowable information - evidence would be inherently incomplete

metadata.challenge: Claims about unknowns or gaps in human knowledge
metadata.test_purpose: Verify system handles epistemically limited claims

claims.text: Marcus Chen's thoughts during his morning commute on October 15, 2024
claims.reason: Claim about private thoughts without external evidence
claims.expected_behavior: Should return INSUFFICIENT - internal mental states
